title: Help with wireless connection!
body: Ok so whenever others are home I lag in game about every 10 seconds to 200 ping. It's very weird lag too it almost looks like fps lag but my PC is a beast. I play on wireless connection and there are 3 other wireless connection users int he house and I'm pretty sure we're all on the same channel. So could changing my channel fix these problems or should I ask to move the modem?

replies.body: Wireless will never be as good as using an Ethernet cable. Put modem in your room, connect via Ethernet cable, tell others to deal with crappy wireless connections.

Try it and see.

Can you try an ethernet cable too?

If neither of those work your only option is to ~~murder~~ disconnect your housemates.

Good luck!
